author: Aaron Katersky, Meredith Deliso
title: Crypto torture suspects plead not guilty as new details of alleged kidnapping emerge
description: The suspects, both handcuffed and in jumpsuits, were arraigned in a Manhattan courtroom Wednesday after a grand jury indicted them on a dozen charges.
content: Two men accused of torturing an Italian businessman in a luxe New York City townhouse to obtain his cryptocurrency have pleaded not guilty to charges of kidnapping, assault and coercion as prosecutor… [+2601 chars]
